data.name: ReadDocumentField
data.value: select distinct top(1) T1.ORDER_POSITION, T1.FLD_NAME, T1.DOC_NAME, T1.DOC_EFFECTIVE_DTE from CKT_DOCUMENT_FIELD T1 join CKT_FIELD_VALUE T2 on (@fldName = T1.FLD_NAME) and (T1.DOC_EFFECTIVE_DTE = T2.DOC_EFFECTIVE_DTE) and (T1.DOC_NAME = T2.DOC_NAME) and (T1.FLD_NAME = T2.FLD_NAME)

data.name: ReadField
data.value: select top(1) NAME, DEPENDANCY, SUBROUTINE_NAME, SCREEN_NAME, DESCRIPTION, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST from CKT_FIELD where NAME = @name
